island, farther southeast alaska. wrangell–st. elia nation park preserv iucn categori vi (protect area sustain use natur resources) mount st. elias, second highest point unit state canada locat wrangell–st. elia nation park preserv within alaska locat valdez–cordova censu area, yakutat citi borough, southeast fairbank censu area, alaska, &#160;unit state nearest&#160;c copper center, alaska coordin 61°00′n 142°00′w﻿ / ﻿61.000°n 142.000°w﻿ / 61.000; -142.000coordinates: 61°00′n 142°00′w﻿ / ﻿61.000°n 142.000°w﻿ / 61.000; -142.000 area 13,175,799 acr (5,332,057&#160;ha) (park &amp; preserve) 8,323,147.59 acr (3,368,258.33&#160;ha) (park only) 4,852,652.14 acr (1,963,798.65&#160;ha) (preserv only)[1] establish decemb 2, 1980 (park &amp; preserve) decemb 1, 1978 (nation monument) visitor 87,158 (in&#160;2012)[2] world&#160;heritag site 1979 wrangell–st. elia nation park preserv unit state nation park nation preserv manag nation park servic south central alaska. park preserv establish 1980 alaska nation interest land conserv act.[3] protect area includ intern biospher reserv part kluane/wrangell–st. elias/glaci bay/tatshenshini-alsek unesco world heritag site. park preserv form largest area manag nation park servic unit state area total 13,175,799 acr (20,587.186&#160;sq&#160;mi; 53,320.57&#160;km2). park includ larg portion saint elia mountains, includ highest peak unit state canada, yet within 10 mile (16&#160;km) tidewater, one highest relief world. wrangell–st. elia border canada' kluan nation park reserv east approach u.s. glacier bay nation park south. chief distinct park preserv land sport hunt prohibit park permit preserve. addition, 9,078,675 acr (3,674,009&#160;ha) park design largest singl wilder unit states. wrangell–st. elia nation monument initi design december&#160;1, 1978, presid jimmi carter use antiqu act, pend final legisl resolv allot public land alaska. establish nation park preserv follow passag alaska nation interest land conserv act 1980. park, bigger countri switzerland, long, extrem cold winter short summer season. support varieti larg mammal environ defin rel land elevation. plate tecton respons uplift mountain rang cross park. park' extrem high point mount st. elia 18,008 feet (5,489&#160;m), second tallest mountain unit state canada. park shape compet forc volcan glaciation. mount wrangel activ volcano, one sever volcano western wrangel mountains. st. elia rang mount churchil erupt explos within past 2,000 years. park' glacial featur includ malaspina glacier, largest piedmont glacier north america, hubbard glacier, longest tidewat glacier alaska, nabesna glacier, world' longest valley glacier. bagley icefield cover much park' interior, includ 60% perman ice-cov terrain alaska. center park, boomtown kennecott exploit one world' richest deposit copper 1903 1938, expos part incorpor kennicott glacier. mine build mills, abandoned, compos nation histor landmark district. content 1 geographi commun 5.2 anim 6 galleri 7 see also 8 refer 9 bibliographi 10 extern link geography[edit] wrangell–st. elia nation park preserv includ entir wrangel range, western portion saint elia mountain eastern portion chugach mountains. lesser rang park preserv includ nutzotin mountains, extens alaska range, granit rang robinson mountains. broad river run glacial valley ranges, includ chitina river, chisana river nabesna river. chisana nabesna tributari copper river, flow along western margin park headwat within park, copper glacier. park includ dozen glacier icefields. bagley icefield cover portion st. elia chugach ranges, malaspina glacier cover southeastern extens park, hubbard glacier park' extrem eastern boundary, largest tidewat glacier north america.[4] eastern boundari park alaska' border canada, adjoin kluan nation park reserve. southeast park bound yakutat bay, tongass nation forest gulf alaska. remaind southern boundari follow crest chugach mountains, adjoin chugach nation forest. western boundari copper river, northern boundari follow mentasta mountain border tetlin nation wildlif refuge.[5] mount st. elia second highest mountain canada unit states. total nine 16 highest peak u.s. soil locat park, along north america' largest subpolar icefield, glaciers, rivers, activ volcano, histor kennecott copper mines.[6] st. elia wrangel rang seen volcan activity. st. elia volcano consid extinct, volcano wrangel rang activ holocen time. ten separ volcano document western wrangel range, mount blackburn highest mount wrangel recent active.[7] mount st. elia situat border wrangell–st. elia nation park kluan nation park reserve. 18,074 feet (5,509&#160;m),[8] nearli 66 percent park preserv land design wilderness.[9] wrangell–st. elia wilder largest design wilder unit states.[3] map wrangell–st. elia nation park park region divid nation park lands, allow subsist hunt local rural residents, preserv lands, allow sport hunt gener public. preserv land includ chitina valley north river, two part copper river valley east river, chisana nabesna valleys, land along yakutat bay.[5] park access highway anchorage; two rough gravel road (the mccarthi road nabesna road) wind park make portion interior access backcountri camp hiking.[10] charter aircraft also fli park.[10] wrangell–st. elia receiv 60,000 visitor 2011.[11] park area includ small settlements. nabesna chisana northern part park. kennicott mccarthi rel close togeth center park, smaller settlement nearbi along 60-mile (97&#160;km) mccarthi road. chitina serv gateway commun mccarthi road meet edgerton highway along copper river. mccarthi road nabesna road signific road park.[5] activities[edit] edgerton highway run along valley copper river western margin park. headquart visitor center mile 106.8 near copper center. road access park' interior along nabesna road mccarthi road. abandon mine town kennecott access footbridg continu mccarthi road. backcountri access avail air taxi services.[12] access park open year, park facil open may september, although locat open late end may close mid-august. main visitor center remain open weekday winter.[13] climat park' interior domin long, cold winter temperatur may remain freez five months. nighttim low temperatur sink −50&#160;°f (−46&#160;°c) daytim high 5&#160;°f (−15&#160;°c) 7&#160;°f (−14&#160;°c) usual. summer last two months, june july, bring flower bite insects, maximum temperatur 80&#160;°f (27&#160;°c). late summer bring drizzle. begin get cool august, first snow fall september. condit temper along coast, high mountain retain snow year.[14] kendesnii campground nabesna road park service-manag campground park. number privat campground lodg mccarthi nabesna roads, fourteen public-us cabins. cabin access air.[15] access road near slana ranger station, associ airstrips.[16] backcountri camp allow without permit. establish maintain trail park.[17] mountain bike mainli limit road due prevail boggi condit summer.[18] hand, float trip river popular way see park copper, nizina, kennicott chitina rivers.[19] park preserv includ highest peak north america, popular destin mountain climbing. 70 tallest mountain alaska, 35 park, includ seven top ten peaks.[20] climb peak technic demanding, requir expedit access remot danger terrain.[21] addit copper center visitor center, park maintain visitor center kennecott inform station mile 59 mccarthi road. ranger station slana nabesna road, chitina end edgerton highway,and yakutat.[22] yakutat ranger station share glacier bay nation park preserve.[23] park mccarthy.[25] air taxi provid access sea kayak tour oper vicin ici bay.[26] farther east park' coast, cruis ship frequent visitor hubbard glacier yakutat bay.[27] sport hunt trap allow within preserv lands. subsist hunt local resid permit park preserve. hunt manag jointli nation park service, alaska depart fish game, issu hunt licenses. use off-road vehicl (orvs) restrict specif rout permit requir use orv preserve.[28] geology[edit] nabesna glacier southern part alaska compos seri terran push north american landmass action plate tectonics. pacif plate move northwestward rel north american plate 2 inch (5.1&#160;cm) 2.5 inch (6.4&#160;cm) per year,[29] meet continent landmass gulf alaska. pacif plate subduct alaskan landmass, compress continent rock give rise seri mountain ranges. terran island arc carri surfac pacif plate carri alaskan landmass compress folded, fulli carri earth' interior. result, seri terranes, collect known wrangellia composit terrane, push south coast alaska, follow southern margin composit terran south border rang fault system.[30] byproduct subduct process format volcano distanc inland subduct zone.[31] present yakutat terran push materi similar density, result uplift combin accret subduction. nearli alaska compos seri terran push north america.[32] coastal region seismic activ frequent larg earthquakes. major quak occur 1899 (four magnitud 7 8) 1958 (7.7), follow 1964 alaska earthquak (9.2). 1979 st. elia earthquak reach magnitud 7.9.[33][34] six terran one sedimentari belt document wrangell–st. elias. north south, oldest youngest, windi yukon-tanana (180 million year ago), gravina-nutzotin belt (120 mya), wrangellia, alexander, chugach (previous assembl elsewhere, accret wrangellia composit terran 110-67 mya), princ william (50mya) yakutat terran (begin 26 mya).[35] wrangellian rock includ fossilifer sedimentari rock interspers volcan rocks.[36] alaskan coast reach approxim modern configur 50 million year ago, complet subduct now-vanish kula plate north america.[33] present subduct pacif plate southern alaska go 26&#160;million years. oldest volcano wrangell–st. elia nation park preserv 26&#160;million year old, near alaska-yukon territori border st. elia range. activ move north west area.[7] volcan activity[edit] mount wrangel major volcano wrangel volcan field lie western end wrangel mountains. western wrangel volcano unusu subduction-rel volcanoes, gener non-explos nature. major volcano unusu larg shield volcano built present size quickli volumin flow andesit lava erupt multipl centers.[37] growth associ arriv yakutat terrane, consider activ 200,000 year ago, movement along denali-totchunda fairweath fault began accommod pacif plate' motion. reason, larg magmat flow regard unlik present day. major wrangel volcano shield volcano larg collaps caldera summits. mount wrangel modifi glacier sharper, steeper relief gentle, round form character young shield volcanoes. shield volcano surround cinder cone form main volcano.[38] mount sanford ten highest summit wrangel mountain volcan origin, sever among volumin volcano world. mount wrangel wrangel volcano consid active.[38] wrangel measur 14,163 feet (4,317&#160;m) height. built seri larg lava flow 600,000 200,000&#160;year ago. three compar modest erupt episod report 1784, 1884–85 1900. gentli slope dome featur ice-fil summit caldera measur 3.6 mile (5.8&#160;km) 2.5 mile (4.0&#160;km). three crater contain fumarol produc steam plume visibl calm, clear days. summit produc occasion phreatic erupt coat ice ash. 1980 summit' heat flux suffici melt 100&#160;million cubic metr (3.5×10^9&#160;cu&#160;ft) ice form small crater lake. activ subsid sinc 1986 ice accumul since. last larg erupt magma wrangel estim 50,000 100,000&#160;year ago. summit caldera estim collaps 200,000 50,000&#160;year ago. 13,009-foot (3,965&#160;m) mount zanetti larg cinder cone wrangell' northwest flank, estim less 25,000 year old.[39][40] volcano wrangel mountain mount drum westernmost wrangel volcano. 12,010 feet (3,660&#160;m) high, domin local landscap much higher mountains. mount drum either shield volcano stratovolcano extens erod glacial activity, preced explos activ 250,000–150,000 year ago destroy summit may measur 14,000 16,000 feet (4,300 4,900&#160;m). erupt gener extens mudflows, repres last activ mount drum. mount drum support least eleven glacier flow summit icefield.[41] mount sanford tallest western wrangel volcano 16,237 feet (4,949&#160;m), 13th highest peak north america. complex shield volcano first form 900,000 year ago. latest erupt estim 320,000 100,000&#160;year ago. like drum, sanford larg icefield 8,000 feet (2,400&#160;m) feed seri glaciers.[42] capit mountain locat near mount sanford, much smaller 7,731 feet (2,356&#160;m) height. shield volcano, 10 mile (16&#160;km) diameter. summit collaps form caldera roughli 2.5 mile (4.0&#160;km) diameter. last activ million year ago, deepli erod glacial activity.[43] tanada peak older larger neighbor capit mountain, 9,358 feet (2,852&#160;m) tall 4-mile (6.4&#160;km) 5-mile (8.0&#160;km) summit caldera. shield volcano last erupt 900,000 year ago dissect glaciers.[44] skookum creek volcano volcan center heavili eroded. activ 3.2&#160;million 2&#160;million year ago. 7,125 feet (2,172&#160;m) high highest point, old shield volcano sever eroded. caldera surround seri dacit rhyolit domes. mount jarvi shield volcano. 13,421 feet (4,091&#160;m) high, one indistinct summit calderas. cover ice erupt 1.7&#160;million 1&#160;million year ago.[45] mount blackburn 16,390 feet (5,000&#160;m) highest point wrangells, 12th highest peak north america,and oldest volcano range. shield volcano fill caldera activ 4.2&#160;million 3.4&#160;million year ago. mount blackburn ice-cov sourc kennicott glacier nabesna glacier, among others.[45] boomerang volcano small shield volcano, rise 3,949 feet (1,204&#160;m). least one million year old overlaid deposit capit mountain.[46] mount gordon cinder cone, one largest wrangel 9,040 feet (2,760&#160;m).[47] sever hot spring mud volcano vicin mount drum produc warm brackish water charg carbon dioxide. largest call shrub, upper klawasi lower klawasi. deposit hydrothermally-alt mud built cone 150 300 feet (46 91&#160;m) high 8,000 feet (2,400&#160;m) diameter.[40][48] chief volcano st. elia rang mount bona mount churchill. 16,421 feet (5,005&#160;m) 15,638 feet (4,766&#160;m), respectively, highest fourth-highest volcano unit state fourth seventh highest north america,[49] bona tenth highest peak kind north america. churchil often regard subsidiari peak bona.[49] ice-cov stratovolcanoes. churchil sourc white river ash. erupt 100 ad 700 ad, spread ash across much alaska northwestern canada.[40][49] glacier icefields[edit] malaspina glacier space mountain rang wrangell–st. elia account 60 percent glacial ice alaska, cover 1,700 squar mile (4,400&#160;km2). glacier advanc retreat repeatedly, reach sea fill valley copper river. glacial dam valley retain lake atna wisconsin glaciation. drainag lake scour riverb bedrock bremner river.[50] sever featur particularli notable. malaspina glacier largest piedmont glacier north america, hubbard glacier 75 mile (121&#160;km) longest tidewat glacier alaska, nabesna glacier world' longest valley glacier, 75 mile (121&#160;km).[51] glacier wrangell–st. elia mostli retreat. bagley icefield grown thinner glacier retreated, includ portion feed malaspina glacier, stagnant retreating. malaspina' west east lobe fill ici bay yakutat bay, respectively, 1000 year ago, guyot, yahts tynal glacier individu retreat head ici bay.[52] however, hubbard glacier advanc 1894, close russel fjord.[53][54] minerals[edit] five major mine district develop wrangell–st. elia heyday mine 1890 1960. gold found bremner district 1901, nizina area near kennecott. gold area placer gold, obtain hydraul mining. copper nugget found gold usual discard uneconom ship road improv area. gold strike made chisana district, minor stamped 1913 1917 area miners. 1930 lode ore mine nabesna district.[55] chief sourc copper kennecott lode next kennicott glacier. copper sulfid ore assay 70% copper first discovered, among richest ever found. total product amount 536,000 metric ton copper 100 metric ton silver. chalcocit ore exhaust mine work malachit azurit deposit embed hydrothermally-alt dolomite.[56] copper believ dissolv hot water move copper-rich nikolai greenstone, redeposit concentr form chitiston limeston reaction sulfide-rich water limestone.[57] number site southern side wrangel investig prospected, even produc small amount ore, none commerci exploited.[58] large, low-grad deposit nickel molybdenum investig late 1970s.[59] history[edit] earli histori exploration[edit] archeolog evid indic human enter wrangel mountain 1000 ad. ahtna peopl settl small group along cours copper river. upper tanana speaker settl along nabesna chisana rivers. eyak peopl settl near mouth copper river gulf alaska. along coast tlingit peopl dispersed, settl yakutat bay.[60] first european area russian explor traders. vitu bere land area 1741. fur trader followed. perman russian trade post establish 1793 lebedev-lastochkin compani port etch hinchinbrook island near mouth copper river. compet post oper shelikov compani establish 1796 yakutat bay. shelikov compani sent dmitri tarkhanov explor lower copper river look copper deposits, inspir report nativ peopl use implement point made pure copper.[61] anoth explor parti 1797 kill natives. semyen potochkin success 1798, reach mouth chitina river spend winter ahtna. 1799 konstantin galaktionov reach tazlina river, wound attack ahtna. kill return trip 1803. tlingit eyak attack destroy russian post yakutat 1805. 1819 parti afanasii klimovskii sent explor copper river again, reach upper portion river establish copper fort trade post near taral. parti start taral 1848 intent reach yukon river kill ahtna, end russian exploration.[62] mount blackburn kennicott glacier american interest area alaska' acquisit unit state 1867 limit gold found yukon territori 1880s. georg holt first american known explor lower copper river, 1882. 1884 john bremner prospect lower river. year u.s. armi parti led lieuten william abercrombi attempt explor lower river, found passag country' interior glacier valdez arm. 1885 lieuten henri tureman allen fulli explor copper chitina rivers, go cross alaska rang enter yukon river system eventu reach bere sea.[63] allen expedit also note use copper nativ peopl along copper river.[64] sever expedit explor coastal region late 1880s, attempt climb mountains. 1891 expedit led yukon explor frederick schwatka descend nizina, chitina copper river north.[65] miner extraction[edit] main article: kennecott, alaska discoveri gold canadian klondik brought prospector region discov gold along copper river. explorers' report copper tool copper nugget caus u.s. geolog survey send geologist, oscar rohn, look source. rohn report find copper ore kennicott glacier, find source. shortli afterward prospector jack smith clarenc warner said notic green spot hillsid kennecott, prove rich copper lode. engin stephen birch acquir right deposit establish alaska copper coal compani 1903 mine it. birch obtain cash investor like j. p. morgan guggenheim family, becam known "alaska syndicate" ventur becam kennecott mine 1906, eventu becom kennecott copper corporation. town name glacier, misspelled, "kennicott" becam "kennecott."[66] copper deposit found south side wrangel bremner nizina. smaller deposit gold copper found nabesna area.[67] bremner mine camp develop remot site requir construct railway 195 mile (314&#160;km) long cost $23.5&#160;million time construction. copper river northwestern railway (cr&amp;nw) took five year build, extend cordova coast. town chitina mccarthi grew line. kennecott mine employ surfac mining, underground galleries, and, uniquely, mine glacial ice recov ore scrape surfac deposit kennicott glacier encas ice.[68] 1920 highest–grad ore exhaust declin extend 1930s, kennecott oper final shut 1938 extract 4.5&#160;million ton ore, yield 600,000&#160;ton copper 562,500 pound (255,100&#160;kg) silver net profit $100&#160;million investors.[69] report oil ga seep vicin cape yakutaga control bay inspir petroleum explor southern margin along gulf alaska. small oilfield katalla produc oil 1903 1933, refineri destroy fire. petroleum deposit instrument exclus coast ici bay copper river delta futur park. coal seam also note near kushtaka lake.[70] boom took place 1974 1977 construct trans-alaska pipelin system near western margin futur park. boom short-lived, local resid return trapping, fish guid hunter living.[71] thirteen test well drill offshor late 1970 earli 1980s.[70] nation park proposals[edit] first propos protect land region came newli establish u.s. forest servic 1908, pursued.[72] earli studi possibl new park servic unit alaska took place 1930 1940s. first study, entitl alaska&#160;— resourc develop center develop tourism exist park denali (then call mount mckinley nation park), despit dissent co-author bob marshall, advoc strict preservation.[73] 1939 ernest gruening, director divis territori island possess depart interior later governor alaska territory, propos establish park chitina valley, call panorama nation park alaska region nation park, togeth kennicott nation monument, 900-square-mil (2,300&#160;km2) area includ kennicott glacier kennecott mine site.[72] gruen support secretari interior harold l. ickes, presid franklin d. roosevelt declin act, note urgency, cite direct non-defens relat measur defer prepar loom world war ii.[74] lukewarm assess mount mckinley superintend frank 1941 diminish enthusiasm. however, canada propos st. elia mountain intern park region 1942, establish kluan game sanctuari 1943 side border, would eventu becom kluan nation park. action inspir interior depart discuss correspond system park alaska side, would includ glacier bay nation monument, portion wrangel chugach mountains, malaspina bere glaciers.[75] 1964 georg hartzog, director nation park service, initi new studi entitl oper great land, advoc develop promot exist alaska parks.[73] gruening, one alaska' senators, propos "nation park highway" region 1966.[75] action park servic late 1960 result master plan draft legislation. 1969 interior' bureau outdoor recreat propos bureau land manag overse 10.5-million-acr (42,000&#160;km2) wrangel mountain scenic area. manag scheme propos allow resourc develop addit preserv recreation. park servic reaction hostile, secretari interior former alaska governor walter j. hickel support idea. despit effort preserv possibl resourc development, hickel' successor governor, keith harvey miller, oppos propos nation scenic area ground would pre-empt potenti alaska state land claim area.[76] 1971 alaska nativ claim settlement act (ancsa) spur new propos alaska parks. part process divest feder land state alaska nativ corporations, act requir withdraw 80&#160;million acr (320,000&#160;km2) land conservation. nation park servic respond propos 15,000,000-acr (6,100,000&#160;ha) alaska nation park wrangel mountain region. hickel' successor interior secretari roger morton cut propos area 9.3&#160;million acr (3,800,000&#160;ha), withdraw western wrangel mountain exclud mount wrangel mount sanford. later amend brought propos acreag back 13.4&#160;million acr (54,000&#160;km2). scaled-back park 8,640,000 acr (3,500,000&#160;ha) propos interior 1973, togeth 5.5-million-acr (22,000&#160;km2) wrangel mountain nation forest, get cold recept preservationist developers. compet bill draft 1974 preserv develop interest littl advancement. year park servic forest servic start joint studi wrangel area cooper glacier studi architectur survey kennecott mills.[77] view along mccarthi road varieti bill introduc congress 1976 wide vari propos acreag level protection. none succeeded, one bill propos conservation-ori group introduc concept nation preserves, would enjoy protect associ nation parks, would allow hunting. 1977 repres morri k. udal introduc first version alaska nation interest land conserv act (anilca) h.r. 39, 14-million-acr (57,000&#160;km2) wrangell–st. elia nation park 1.8-million-acr (7,300&#160;km2) chisana nation preserv proposed. although support park service, bill oppos alaska. revis bill propos interior department, 9.6&#160;million acr (3,900,000&#160;ha) nation park land 2.49&#160;million acr (10,100&#160;km2) adjoin preserve, name wrangell–st. elias. hear 1978 adjust areas, boundari rel proport park preserv lands, view allow hunt dall sheep wrangel mountains, introduc nation recreat area north mountains.[78] alaska senat mike gravel threaten filibust propos anilca bill, effect kill it. follow blockag effort part alaska author claim land fell within propos protections, presid jimmi carter invok antiqu act proclaim 17 alaskan nation monuments, includ 10,950,000 acr (4,430,000&#160;ha) wrangell–st. elia nation monument december&#160;1, 1978.[79][80] monument design carri dedic fund park develop operations, engend consider hostil alaskans, regard design antiqu act feder land grab. park servic personnel assign area receiv threats, park servic airplan destroy fire august 1979. attitud sharpli divid white alaskans, larg oppos park felt forc out, nativ ahtnas, grant subsist hunt right expect profit tourism.[81] nation park preserve[edit] januari 1979, udal introduc modifi version h.r. 39. follow markup negoti hous senat versions, bill modifi senat approv hous novemb 12.[82] december&#160;2, 1980, anilca bill sign law jimmi carter, convert wrangell–st. elia nation park preserv initi area 8,147,000 acr (3,297,000&#160;ha) park 4,171,000 acr (1,688,000&#160;ha) preserve.[83] boundari park preserv area drawn accord perceiv valu sceneri versu hunt potenti accord legislation, design area includ 9,660,000 acr (3,910,000&#160;ha) wilderness, stipul somewhat less restrict manner standard practic continent unit states.[84] opposit park persist congression design alaskans, resent feder govern presenc gener nation park servic presenc particular. vandal persisted, ranger cabin burn airplan damaged, other skirt regul voic resent what, view, elitist attitud embodi park park service.[85] however, relat improv time, local busi promot park work park servic tourism projects. incid continued, notabl involv arson ranger station, relat bottom 1994 park superintend karen wade testifi congress increas fund way perceiv confirm residents' suspicion park service, exacerb commentari local newspap wrongli attribut wade. mark high point resent park, local resid began take part park servic sponsor events.[86] nevertheless, 1979 design region unesco world heritag site continu seen suspicion. john birch societi claim design part unit nation plan assum control u.s. nation park system.[87] state alaska propos major improv mccarthi road 1997, plan pave add scenic turnout trailhead along length. although road remain gravel, widen smoothed. rental car agenc continu prohibit use vehicl mccarthi road.[88] addit designations[edit] transbord park system kluan / wrangell–st. elia / glacier bay / tatshenshini-alsek (compris wrangell–st. elia three nation provinci parks) declar unesco world heritag site 1979 spectacular glacier icefield landscap well import grizzli bears, carib dall sheep habitat.[3] 9,078,675 acr (3,674,009&#160;ha) park preserv design wrangell–saint elia wilder upon park' establish 1980,[89] largest singl wilder area unit states.[90] ecology[edit] park preserv cover area larger switzerland, extend gulf alaska alaskan interior, altitud vari sea level 19,000 feet (5,800&#160;m), wrangell–st. elia wide varieti habitats. much park high mountain peak cover perman ice, glacier icefields. river occupi broad, flat glacial valley constantly-chang braid riverbeds.[91] environ divid five major categories, apart rel steril glacial riverb areas: lowlands, wetlands, uplands, sub-alpin alpine. environ influenc defin presenc permafrost, perman frozen sub-soil.[92] plant communities[edit] lowland region park border gulf alaska well lower level river valleys. black spruce domin area permafrost, understori alder, labrador tea, willow blueberry, varieti ground mosses.[92] wetland occur along coast well interior river basins. permafrost region often marshi region muskeg. wetland area primarili grassy, sedg small shrubs. horsetail equisetum palustr spikerush also found.[92] drier forest upland portion park mostli interior boreal forest, taiga. distribut tree speci determin fire frequenc extent. abund conif forest black spruce larger white spruce, white spruce preval area without permafrost. black spruce better adapt fire conditions. quak aspen paper birch common decidu speci among first tree grow follow fire.[93] follow balsam poplar eventu white spruce.[92] subalpin environ occur local tree line, wrangell–st. elia usual vari 1,100 metr (3,600&#160;ft) 1,700 metr (5,600&#160;ft). plant low slow-grow shrubs, mainli graminoid forbs.[92] alpin environ variabl accord avail water. start variabl altitud 1,100 metr (3,600&#160;ft) dri area 1,400 1,800 metr (4,600 5,900&#160;ft) wetter areas. heath low-grow willow common, along forbs.[92] animals[edit] larg mammal includ black bears, brown bears, gray wolv caribou. mountain goat dall sheep found mountain areas. approxim 13,000 dall sheep inhabit wrangell–st. elias, one highest concentr speci north america. moose, though unusual, may sometim found area willow growth.[94] smaller mammal includ wolverines, beavers, lynxes, porcupines, martens, river otters, red foxes, coyotes, ground fli squirrels, hoari marmots, weasels, snowsho hares, sever speci vole mice, collar pikas. american bison establish two herd park. cougar consid possibl documented.[95] water along coast host whales, porpoises, harbor seal sea lions. endang steller sea lion may found park waters.[96] twenty-on speci fish document fresh water park. differ fish distribut depend drainage: northern pike seen copper river drainages, salmon speci seen yukon river drainages.[97] larg freshwat fish includ chinook, chum, coho, pink sockey salmon, well salmonid lake trout, cutthroat trout, dolli varden, arctic grayl rainbow trout. fish includ eulachon, burbot, round whitefish, northern pike, pacif lamprey, lake chub varieti sculpins.[98] 93 speci bird inhabit wrangell–st. elias, though 24 remain harsh winter. common bird includ willow rock ptarmigan, gray jays, common ravens, hermit thrushes, american robins, hairi woodpeck northern flickers. owl includ great horn owls, northern hawk owl boreal owls.[99] gallery[edit] hiker pass mount sanford mount drum mount sanford welcom sign entranc wrangell–st. elia visitor center. double-rainbow park. see also[edit] alaska portal nation regist histor place list wrangell–st. elia nation park
